full_summary:
================================

### Advance Contract Award Notice: Globe Valve Procurement

#### Introduction

This Notice serves as a public announcement of the Directorate Maritime Procurement's intention to award a contract for Globe Valves to Montreal Bronze Ltd. The Notice provides an opportunity for other suppliers to demonstrate their capabilities to meet the requirements set out in this Notice.

#### Requirement Definition

The Department of National Defence seeks to procure the following items:

| Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-013-7721) |
| 2 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-013-7721) |
| 3 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-013-7887) |
| 4 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-013-7887) |
| 5 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-014-0349) |
| 6 | Globe Valve (GSIN: 4820, NSN: 20-014-0349) |

These items are required for delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia, and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

#### Minimum Essential Requirements

To assess a statement of capabilities, any interested supplier must demonstrate one of two options:

A) A letter from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) stating that they will supply the listed items.

B) A statement of capabilities demonstrating that the supplier can provide equivalent products to the listed items, which are:

* Equivalents in form, fit, function, quality, and performance to the specified equipment.
* Fully compatible, interchangeable, and interoperable with the existing equipment owned by Canada.

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Revised World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
